title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 151-2.1 - Scope of subpart
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 151-2.1 - Scope of subpart

State Regulations

The purpose of this Subpart is to carry out the
legislative intent to provide financial assistance to school districts for
operating experimental prekindergarten programs for prekindergarten children
with educational needs associated with poverty. This Subpart also sets forth
procedures and requirements for applying for a grant to operate such
programs. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
§§
151-2.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
